page.title: 12EMPLOYMENT
page.content: { { Employment.} A survey of the employment of parents of 100 children in Millbrook School. There are no large factories locally to employ people,so 22% are self employed and 4% are unemployed. 32% work in the Dockyard,20% serve in the Royal Navy and the Fleet Auxillary Millbrook and St. John are commuter villages for Plymouth.A few people are needed to work in the local shops and on the farms and market gardens.Most of the people who do work locally are women in part-time jobs in shops,pubs, holiday camps,Maker Camp or school kitchen staff and dinner supervisors. A high proportion of Naval staff and Dockyard workers live in St.John because it is nearer to the training establishment of H.M.S.Raleigh and Devonport Dockyard in Plymouth.
